title: Council Decision of 23 October 1995 appointing members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 23 October 1995 appointing members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives (95/C 292/02)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body:
The following are hereby appointed members and alternate members of the Advisory Committee on the Training of Midwives for the period from 23 October 1995 to 22 October 1998:
>TABLE>
>TABLE>
>TABLE>
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 23 October 1995.
For the Council
The President
J. SAAVEDRA ACEVEDO
(1) OJ No L 33, 11. 2. 1980, p. 13.
(2) OJ No C 186, 27. 7. 1990, p. 1.
(3) OJ No C 39, 15. 2. 1991, p. 6.
